tool_description: Cleans and normalizes extracted text by removing unwanted characters, fixing encoding issues, and standardizing whitespace and formatting.

raw_text.description: Raw text content to be cleaned

remove_extra_whitespace.description: Remove multiple consecutive spaces and normalize whitespace

remove_special_chars.description: Remove or replace special characters and symbols

fix_encoding.description: Attempt to fix common encoding issues

normalize_unicode.description: Normalize Unicode characters to standard form

error_messages: Empty input text: Provide non-empty text content for cleaning.
Text too large: Input text exceeds maximum processing size limit.
Encoding detection failed: Unable to determine or fix text encoding issues.
Unicode normalization error: Failed to normalize Unicode characters in the text.
usage: Provide raw_text for cleaning. Use boolean parameters to control specific cleaning operations based on your text quality and requirements.

cleaned_text.description: The cleaned and normalized text content
